channel.title: Hol on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Hol on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: Brilliant idea: VMware Hosted Beta
item.description: Duncan Epping rather unceremoniously published a blog post “New Beta Program offering: VMware Hosted Beta” yesterday, outlining the availability of the new hosted beta offering that companions some of the current VMware beta programs. _Due to the very NDA nature of the beta programs, I can´t really go into details on what is currently offered, but what I can say is this: Well done VMware!_ The VMware Hosted Beta runs on the same engine that runs the VMware Hands on Labs Online – Beta, but with a little added twist.

item.title: VMware Hands-on Lab Online Public Beta Review
item.description: A little while ago VMware announced Project Nee, something I was, and still am, pretty excited about. This afternoon I finally got access to the Hands-on Labs Online Beta part of Project Nee, and I have to say, this looks incredibly promising and useful. At the moment, the available labs are:Cloud Infrastructure: HOL-INF-02 - Explore vSphere 5.1 Distributed Switch (vDS) New Features This lab explores the new features of the vSphere Distributed Switch (vDS).
